concept.title: CMM support for LI purging function with local CLI (Feature f10310-01)
concept.shortdesc: With this feature, the liuser can remove all LIPv2 or ASN.1 targets from CMM and stop all IRI reporting and CC data generation.

conbody.p: If the consistency check feature is used, the ADMF can trigger resending of the targets to the CMM, after purge.
If the ADMF sends the Retrieve Targets Request message to the CMM after purge, the CMM responses to the ADMF that does not have any target. The ADMF can resend the targets to the CMM.
conbody.note: This feature does not automatically inform the ADMF (LIC) about purging all the targets in the CMM. Thus, the operator take follow-up actions to reset the target lists again after this purge function has been performed. Otherwise, the LI function will not work.
